Text.Page:
The Gutrend tribe is wreaking havoc in the ruins of Colchester. You're to put a stop to it.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:6#1062#Gutrend pillagers} and {@LinkCreature:6#1061#brigands} in Colchester.

Report to Dakona north of Echo Ranch when your mission is complete.
Excellent work. The federation appreciates your efforts!

I would love to reward you. Unfortunately, you have to do something useful first.

Come back when you have.
